summary: Add magic to your non-magical followers via these assorted circlets.
descriptionHtml:
Ever wish your follower would just heal themselves already, for fling a darn Firebolt please. This is THAT mod. Smith up a circlet for them and they will.

Currently Spellbinder Circlets of Fire, Frost, Shock, Conjuration and Restoration allows them to use:
(Also grants 50 Magicka so they have something to work with)
-Flames, Firebot and Healing
-Frostbite, IceSpike and Healing
-Sparks, Lightning Bolt and Healing
-Bound Sword, Conjure Familiar and Healing
-Oakflesh, Fast Healing and Healing

As of update 1.1 no longer adds spells to player, just NPCs.
Working on more circlets to allow more fun and useful spells.

Each circlet requires the tomes for the spells so its not like you can get access to spells before you normally would.

UPDATED: No longer adds spells to player just NPCs.
author: Tweak1971
